game.name: Floating Water Surfer Car Driving  Beach Racing
game.description:
Have you got bored of racing on ordinary roads, including congested streets and long highways? If yes, we have got you covered with something special that will allow you to explore a new idea of car racing. Are you ready to accept this challenge, friends? Join Floating Water Surfer Car driving Beach and be prepared to ride a wonderful car through the desert beach! Make sure to pass your car through multiple hindrances and achieve several checkpoints.

Driving this cool car model will make you feel like having an experience of water jetting and submarine racing. Common boys! You will only be able to complete each level if you dare pass through the beach and achieve the checkpoints within the time limit. There are multiple levels and the latest car models to select from in this one of the best HTML5 car racing games. Use your brain to practice the driving skills of a special amphibian car!

Drive your car while taking care of its proper balance on both overland and on the water in this cool water surfer floating car driving simulator! Go through its complete details to transform your car into floating ships like the sky jet boats! Remember you can beat all your competitor jet car surfers by racing your boat cars at fast speed. Perform boat driving stunts on water simulation in this awesome beach surfing game! Check out some cool extreme stunt riding games on atmegame.com on atmegame.com for free and enjoy your friends, no download required.
